entry.title: D_D member @kirstenrpomales from @talentlayer closed 3 grants already! Week 1: @LensProtocol $7.5K Week 3: @pushprotocol $10K Week 4: @protocollabs $5...
entry.summary: D_D member @kirstenrpomales from @talentlayer closed 3 grants already! Week 1: @LensProtocol $7.5K Week 3: @pushprotocol $10K Week 4: @protocollabs $5K They also got into Outlier Ventures Filecoin Basecamp incubator, where they negotiated a $100K. Let's celebrate! 🥳 🥳 🥳

entry.summary:
RT hellokpl.lens is 𝔟𝔲𝔦𝔩𝔡𝔦𝔫𝔤 TalentLayer Hey @developer_dao - some of our team members @TalentLayer need help getting to @EthereumDenver to hack! Check out some of our work at prior hackathons. We're ready to build on @fluence_project!!!
Mattia Pomelli: My team and I applied to be @developer_dao hackers at @EthereumDenver!! Thanks D_D for offering these amazing opportunities 🙏 What do we want to build with @fluence_project? ⤵️

entry.title: RT cami: Just released my in-depth guide on understanding account abstraction! This is seriously some of the best writing I've ever published, and I'm...
entry.summary: RT cami Just released my in-depth guide on understanding account abstraction! This is seriously some of the best writing I've ever published, and I'm excited to bring clarity and simplicity to something notoriously hard to understand. Enjoy this morning read☕️ https://camiinthisthang.substack.com/p/account-abstraction-for-everyone

entry.title: RT Fuel Labs: Want to attend @EthereumDenver to hack but find yourself budget-restrained? Apply for the @developer_dao Builder Scholarships if you're ...
entry.summary:
RT Fuel Labs Want to attend @EthereumDenver to hack but find yourself budget-restrained? Apply for the @developer_dao Builder Scholarships if you're a developer and want to come build on Fuel 👇
Jobs Team: Super excited to announce Builder Scholarships to @EthereumDenver 🎉 We love to see builders ship and for that @developerdao is partnering with @fuellabs_ and @fluence_project to send some of y'all to hack. Applications Open → https://dxql9ua1g5o.typeform.com/to/eLgXtxZp

entry.summary: RT Jobs Team Introducing Fluence 🚀🚀🚀🚀 @fluence_project They are a decentralized serverless platform & computing marketplace powered by blockchain economics. Fluence is a global, permissionless, scalable, and secure alternative to centralized cloud computing platforms.
